CustomField.formula: CASE(Material_Status_Numeric__c, "40","Saleable (40)", "20","Pre-Sales only (20)", "50","Limited Availability (50)", "60","Discont pend'g stock (60)", "70","70-Archive (70)", "80","Obsolete-No Activity (80)", "90","Obsolete+Cred+Debit (90)", "99","Temp Stop Shipment (99)", "Z1","Constrained Product (Z1)", "Z2","Discontinued w/o replacement (Z2)", "Z3","Discontinued w replacement (Z3)", "Z4","Technical defect(Z4)", "Z5","Under Development (Z5)", "Z6","Pre-Sales Only (Z6)", "Z7","Limited Availability (Z7)", "Z8","Discontinued Pending Stock (Z8)", "Z9","Archive (Z9)", "ZE","Awaiting GTIN Update (ZE)", "ZO","Obsolete-No Activity (ZO)", "ZR","Under R&D Development (ZR)", "ZT","Temp Stop Shipment (ZT)", "ZU","ObsoleteWReplacement (ZU)", NULL )
CustomField.label: Material Status Description
